answerText: An Enemy of the People [or En Folkefiende][10] This playwright of An Enemy of the People also wrote about Nora Helmer walking out on her husband Torvald in A Doll House.
heading: NASAT |2012 | 1 | 14 | Literature | European | College
subject: Literature
question: Question: The protagonist of this play eventually declares that "the strongest man in the world is the man who stands alone." For 10 points each: [10] Name this play in which Doctor Thomas Stockmann becomes a pariah after discovering that his town's baths are contaminated.
